directions.step:
Combine 1 1/3 cup flour and next 8 ingredients; beat at Low speed of electric mixer until well blended. Increase speed of mixer to medium, and beat 2 additional minutes; stir in remaining flour. Cover dough, and chill at least 1 hour. Divide dough in half. Working with one portion at a time, place dough on a heavily floured surface; roll out to 1/2 inch thickness. Cut dough with a floured doughnut cutter. Heat 2-3 inches of oil to 375 F.; drop in 3-4 doughnuts at a time. Cook about 1 minute or until golden on one side; turn and cook other side, about 1 minute. Drain on paper towels. Sprinkle with confectioner's sugar, if desired. Yield: about 2 dozen. Submitted to magazine by Ann Davis, Waco Texas MC formatting by bobbi744@sojourn.com
